fiatRamps.title: Buy or Sell Crypto
fiatRamps.titleMessage: ShapeShift has partnered with several fiat ramp providers for buying and selling cryptocurrencies.

connectWalletPage.body: 100% Free. Open Source. Community Owned. Non-Custodial. Private.
connectWalletPage.header: Please connect a wallet to get started

bodies.rateFluctuationInfo: The rate of %{assetName} you earn, the Annual Percentage Return (APR), typically fluctuates between 7% - 20%.
bodies.amountStakingInfo: You can stake any amount of %{assetName} and they’ll immediately beginning earning rewards.
bodies.withdrawInfo: You can withdraw your rewards at anytime, which requires a small gas fee around ~$.01.
bodies.unbondingInfo: When you unstake your tokens, they’ll remain locked for %{unbondingDays} days, during which time they won’t earn rewards. After the %{unbondingDays} days, your %{assetName} will return to your Primary Wallet.
bodies.slashingInfo: Staking is done through a validator. It’s incredibly rare, but if the validator you’ve staked with messes up by allowing false or incorrect transactions to go through, you could lose a part of your assets.
bodies.partnerInfo: We’ve mitigated this risk by partnering with a reputable validator—which has a secure, reliable, and audited infrastructure.

learnMore.userProtectionInfo: *Returns are estimated and fluctuate with market conditions.

getStarted.body: Staking is the process of holding funds in a cryptocurrency wallet to support the operations of a blockchain network and, in return, holders are rewarded for their contribution.
getStarted.userProtectionInfo: *Returns are estimated and fluctuate with market conditions.

cosmosOverview.rewards: The rewards you earn will accrue automatically.
cosmosOverview.emptyWithdraws: Pending unstaking requests will show here.

foxyOverview.header: Deposit FOX to get FOXy to earn
foxyOverview.body: FOXy is a rebasing token pegged to the price of FOX. Staked FOX is put to work across different DeFi protocols to earn the best yield possible.
foxyOverview.rewards: The rewards you earn will accrue automatically.
foxyOverview.emptyWithdraws: Pending or active withdrawals will show here.

overview.noWithdrawals: You don't have any withdrawals to claim.

claim.rewardDepositInfo: Your rewards will be deposited into your primary wallet.
claim.title: Claim Staking Rewards

defi.notEnoughFundsInReserve: Not enough funds in liquidity reserve contract
defi.unbondInfoItWillTake: While your tokens are staked you will not be able to transfer or spend them. It will take %{unbondingDays} days to unlock them after you unstake them.
defi.unbondInfoItWillTakeShort: It will take %{unbondingDays} days to unstake your tokens
defi.defiBody: Explore a growing universe of DeFi opportunities.
defi.earnBody: Earn passive income by staking your assets or depositing them into a DeFi strategy.
defi.byFarming: APR* by farming your ETH-FOX liquidity pool tokens

farming.body: You are not currently farming anything.

stakingVaults.body: Explore opportunities to earn interest on your crypto assets.

pools.body: You have not deposited into any liquidity pools.

staking.toUnlock: to unlock your %{assetSymbol} after you unstake. Staking rewards will need to be withdrawn separately.

trade.gasFeeExceedsTradeAmountThreshold: Gas fee exceeds %{percentage}% of trade amount
trade.needPermission: needs your permission to use your %{symbol}
trade.whyNeedThis: Why do I need to do this?

tooltip.rate: This is the expected rate for this trade pair.
tooltip.minerFee: This is the fee to process the transaction on the blockchain, this is not a fee charged by ShapeShift.
tooltip.protocolFee: This is the fee charged by the protocol selected to process this transaction, this is not a fee charged by ShapeShift
tooltip.shapeshiftFee: ShapeShift does not add fees on trades 🎉

errors.title: Something went wrong
errors.notEnoughEth: Not enough ETH for the gas fee on this transaction.
errors.amountTooSmall: Amount too small. The minimum trade amount for this pair is %{minLimit}.
errors.sellAmountDoesNotCoverFee: Amount too small. The sell amount for this pair is lower than the fee.
errors.negativeMax: Not enough funds for the miner fee on this transaction. Est miner fee %{estimatedMinerFee}
errors.invalidMax: Invalid Amount. The maximum trade amount for this pair is %{maxLimit}.
errors.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds for miner fee and amount
errors.broadcastFailed: An error occurred while broadcasting the transaction
errors.insufficientFundsForLimit: Insufficient funds. The minimum trade amount for this pair is %{minLimit}
errors.insufficientFundsForAmount: Insufficient funds. Your %{symbol} balance is less than the selected amount
errors.overMaxSlippage: This trade would result in over %{slippagePercentage}% slippage. Please trade a lower amount for a better price
errors.balanceToLow: Balance too low. The minimum trade amount for this pair is %{minLimit}
errors.quoteFailed: An error occurred getting a quote for your trade.
errors.sellAssetRequired: Cannot execute a quote without an asset to sell
errors.sellAmountRequired: Cannot execute a quote without an amount to sell
errors.depositAddressRequired: Cannot execute an ETH quote without a DEX address
errors.sellAssetNetworkAndSymbolRequired: Both asset network and symbol are required to execute a quote
errors.hdwalletInvalidConfig: An error occurred communicating with your hardware wallet
errors.allowanceRequiredFailed: An error occurred getting approving the allowance required to trade.
errors.checkApprovalNeededFailed: An error occurred checking the approval for your trade.
errors.approveInfiniteFailed: An error occurred approving your trade.
errors.buildTradeFailed: An error occurred building your trade.
errors.minMaxError: An error occurred getting min / max trade amount
errors.executeTradeFailed: An error occurred executing your trade.
errors.unsupportedPair: This trading pair is not currently supported.
errors.unsupportedChain: This chain is not currently supported.
errors.rateError: An error occurred getting trade rates

signing.failed: An error occurred signing the transaction

errors.tradeFailed: Trade failed. Assets returned minus gas fee

errors.unknown: There was an error submitting your passphrase
errors.empty: You are using an empty passphrase

passphrase.body: After submitting your passphrase, use the button on the KeepKey to approve it

label.body: Labeling each of your devices allows you to easily distinguish one from the other.

recoverySettings.recoveryPassphraseDescription: If you are unsure if your recovery sentence is protected by a passphrase, leave this off.

recoverySentence.body: On your KeepKey screen, you will see your recovery sentence. Write it down. If you lose access to the device, your assets will ONLY be accessible by this sentence.
recoverySentence.infoFirst: Its critical you write it down exactly as it appears on the KeepKey.
recoverySentence.infoSecond: Never share your recovery sentence, it grants access to all of your funds.
recoverySentence.awaitingButtonPress: Follow the steps on your KeepKey to view your Recovery Sentence. Write it down!

wiped.body: You have successfully reset your KeepKey to factory defaults. You can now restore using an existing recovery seed, or create a new wallet.

recoverySentenceEntry.body: Using the scrambled keyboard legend on your KeepKey, enter the first 4 letters of each word. If there are less than 4 letters in the word, press Enter, hit the space bar, or click next when you're done typing.
recoverySentenceEntry.awaitingButtonPress: Follow the instructions on your KeepKey to continue.

recoverySettingUp.body: Please wait while we initialize your device and sync your addresses.

recoveryInvalid.body: The Recovery Phrase you have entered is invalid.

connect.body: Connect a KeepKey device and click Pair.
connect.conflictingApp: Could not find your KeepKey. Another application may be trying to connect with your KeepKey.

pin.body: Use PIN layout shown on your device to find the location to press on the PIN pad.

newPin.body: Use PIN layout shown on your device to find the location to press on the PIN pad.

newPinConfirm.body: Use PIN layout shown on your device to find the location to press on the PIN pad.

descriptions.pin: The PIN is a combination of up to 9 numbers that you select after initializing your KeepKey. A PIN protects your device against unauthorized use in the event your KeepKey falls into the wrong hands.
descriptions.passphrase: Enable the ability to have multiple wallets, accessible by using a unique passphrase for each wallet.
descriptions.label: Labelling each of devices allows you to easily distinguish one from the other.
descriptions.timeout: Your device goes to sleep after 10 minutes of activity by default. However, you can change this.
descriptions.buttonPrompt: Press and hold the button on your KeepKey to change the device %{setting}.
descriptions.updateFailed: An error occurred whilst updating the %{setting}.

passphrase.title: Use with caution
passphrase.body: If you forget your passphrase, you will lose access to your funds.

descriptions.wipeKeepKey: I understand that by wiping my KeepKey I will lose access to my funds if I don't have my recovery phrase.

confirmations.wipeKeepKey: Press and hold the button on your KeepKey to confirm the reset to factory defaults.

checkboxes.wipeKeepKey: I have backed up my recovery phrase and understand what I am doing

password.body: Enter a strong password to encrypt your imported wallet. This is how you will access your wallet.
password.warning: Note: If you forget your password, ShapeShift can’t help you recover it.

create.body: Write these 12 words down and store them securely offline. This 12 word phrase is used to recover your wallet private keys.

start.body: You can have multiple ShapeShift wallets. You may load a wallet, import a wallet from a Secret Recovery Phrase, or create a new wallet.

assetCards.stakingBody: Earn passive income by staking your assets or depositing them into a DeFi strategy.

foxPage.foxDescription: Since 2019, our shapeshifting FOX Token has been offering users an ever-expanding world of utility and advantages. Today, our ERC-20 governance token not only enables you to influence the future of ShapeShift through your vote, you also have an ever-expanding universe of investing opportunities. Invest, track, and manage your FOX holdings here.
foxPage.mainStakingDescription: Put your FOX to work in single-sided staking contracts to earn FOX rewards. (FOX can still be used in governance while staked, but is otherwise locked into the contract during staking.)
foxPage.tradingUnavailable: %{assetSymbol} is not yet tradeable on ShapeShift. You can trade %{assetSymbol} on ElasticSwap.

otherOpportunitiesDescription.FOX: Explore the many opportunities for providing liquidity, farming for yield, lending and borrowing. Click the “Get Started” links below to visit the external sites of interest to learn more—and put your FOX to work for you.
otherOpportunitiesDescription.FOXy: Quickly and easily purchase FOXy, the industry’s first DAO rebasing token that offers both yield and profit rewards.

foxPage.governanceDescription: As a FOX holder, you can have a voice in the future of ShapeShift. Below are active or recently passed DAO proposals voted on by token holders.

optInModal.title: Help us improve ShapeShift
optInModal.description: ShapeShift would like to gather usage data to better understand how our users interact with the app. This data will be used to continually improve the usability and user experience of our product.
optInModal.noThanks: No thanks, take me to the private version
optInModal.sendEvents: Send anonymized click and pageview events
optInModal.neverCollectPersonalInformations: Never collect keys, addresses, transactions, balances, or any personal information
optInModal.neverCollectIp: Never collect your full IP address
